Class Date

java.lang.Object
Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
This class represents a Date with year, month, and day. Provides methods to check if a date is valid (isValid()) and to compare dates (compareTo())

    • compareTo

      Compares this date with another date for sorting.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      other - the other date to compare
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this date is earlier than, equal to, or later than the specified date
